item.title: Mouse Major Satellite
item.description:
Cell type/line üîó

Mouse embryo fibroblast, C3H/10T1/2 (10T).

Method üîó

  • Since there are still gaps in mm39 reference
  • Extract sequence-specific reads from fastq files using seqkit, avoiding mapping (may also make it easy to compare ChIP-seq and cut&run ‚Ä¶?)
  • ‚Äúsatellite-specific‚Äù sequence from Pailles et al. 20221.
